alert.textSaveConfig: Save configuration beforehand! The function requires an active lexicon plugin (min. version 2.8.3) in Shopware 5.
alert.textFunctionLimited: The import of entries is limited to 4000 lexicon entries. Depending on the amount of data, it can take a long time and is divided into 3 steps.
alert.textLogging: Errors/warnings/notes are saved as a logbook entry.
alert.textCreatedData: Lexicon entries that have already been imported will NOT be updated!
alert.textToManual: Please read the detailed explanation of migration in our manual

notification.emptySettings: To execute, please save the Shopware 5 URL and the Shopware 5 key.
notification.errorResolveHost: The assembled url could not be accessed.
notification.errorCronKey: Access denied - please enter the valid key from the Shopware 5 order management configuration
notification.errorCallResultSw5Data: Shopware 5 data could not be retrieved successfully.
notification.errorNoSw5Entries: No Shopware 5 data available to import
notification.errorToManyEntries: More than 4000 entries found - import stopped.
notification.errorProductAssignments: An error occurred while fetching the product links - migration aborted
notification.errorShopAssignments: An error occurred while fetching the shop links - migration aborted
notification.successImportProductAssignments: Successfully linked lexicon entries to products (step 2 / 3)
notification.successImportShopAssignments: Successfully linked lexicon entries with sales channels (step 3 / 3)

seo.text: Create the seo urls for the lexicon pages
seo.link: More Information about the errors in the Shopware loggings
seo.deleteText: Delete all seo urls for the lexicon pages
seo.deleteSuccess: The lexicon seo urls have been deleted.
seo.deleteError: Error while deleting the lexicon seo urls!
seo.deleteInfoText: When deleting all lexicon seo urls, their history is also lost. That's why you should only delete it if you have problems.
seo.deleteConfirmText: Do you really want to delete?

seoConfigInfo.text:
Example: Lexicon (without domain) > Access: https://www.mein-shop.de/lexicon

Empty text modules are overwritten by the "Lexicon" fallback. The update takes place daily automatically or manually using the button: Start generation. If problems occur during generation, delete the old SEO URLs first using the button: Start Delete.

IMPORTANT: SEO URLs must be unique. If you already have a "Lexicon" category, this SEO Url is taken and will not be created again.

cmsConfigInfo.text: You can now make the settings for the elements of the lexicon's pages directly in the corresponding elements in the Shopping Experiences!
